description: Italy, Spain and Portugal are among European countries further relaxing virus-related restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: European countries further relax restrictions
title_page: Coronavirus: European countries further relax restrictions - BBC News
maintext: Barcelona, Madrid and parts of the north-west however remain in phase 0. Most restrictions will remain in place, but some small shops will be allowed to reopen on Monday and funerals can be held for groups of up to 10 inside and 15 outside. This has been dubbed "phase 0.5" - an intermediate step in these regions.
